Editing or Deleting a Work Record

With the Task component, you can edit or delete previously entered work records.

To edit a work record:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Click the Task tab on the upper pane.

  3. Do one of the following:

    • Double-click a task or subtask in the task tree or list.

    • Select a task or subtask, then select Properties from the Task menu or the context menu.

    The Task Properties dialog opens.

  4. Select the Work tab.

  5. Select a record from the Work Records list.

  6. Click Edit. This action opens the Work Record dialog.

  7. Update the information, as required.

  8. Click OK.

To delete a work record:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Click the Task tab on the upper pane.

  3. Do one of the following:

    • Double-click a task or subtask in the task tree or list.

    • Select a task or subtask, then select Properties from the Task menu or the context menu.

    The Task Properties dialog opens.

  4. Select the Work tab.

  5. Select a record from the Work Records list.

  6. Click Delete. The message, "Delete Work Record?" appears.

  7. Click Yes.
